title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations and the Principal Regulations shall be construed 

together.

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No.
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Road Traffic
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Road Traffic 

(Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean road traffic (licensing drivers) regulation 2006 (s.i no 537 2006)

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. Where a learner permit granted in accordance with Regulation 17 of the
text_raw:
3. Where a learner permit granted in accordance with Regulation 17 of the 

Principal Regulations expires during the period - 

(a) beginning on 1 March 2020 and ending on 30 June 2020, the 
learner permit shall be deemed to have been granted for an 
additional period of 18 months and the expiry date of permit 
shall be extended by a period of 18 months, 

(b) beginning on 1 July 2020 and ending on 31 October 2020, the 
learner permit shall be deemed to have been granted for an 
additional period of 14 months and the expiry date of permit 
shall be extended by a period of 14 months, or 

(c) 

beginning on 1 November 2020 and ending on 31 July 2021, the 
learner permit shall be deemed to have been granted for an 
additional period of 10 months and the expiry date of permit 
shall be extended by a period of 10 months.
text_norm: 3 learner permit granted accordance regulation 17 principal regulation expires period - (a) beginning 1 march 2020 ending 30 june 2020 learner permit shall deemed granted additional period 18 month expiry date permit shall extended period 18 month (b) beginning 1 july 2020 ending 31 october 2020 learner permit shall deemed granted additional period 14 month expiry date permit shall extended period 14 month (c) beginning 1 november 2020 ending 31 july 2021 learner permit shall deemed granted additional period 10 month expiry date permit shall extended period 10 month

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No.
heading: 4. Where a learner permit, granted in accordance with Regulation 17 of
text_raw:
4. Where a learner permit, granted in accordance with Regulation 17 of 
the Principal Regulations, is a permit to drive vehicles of more than one 
category and an expiry date, by category, occurs during the period - 

(a) beginning on 1 March 2020 and ending on 30 June 2020, the 
learner permit in respect of the category concerned shall be 
deemed to have been granted for an additional period of 18 
months and the expiry date, by category shall be extended by a 
period of 18 months, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [303] 3 

(b) beginning on 1 July 2020 and ending on 31 October 2020, the 
learner permit in respect of the category concerned shall be 
deemed to have been granted for an additional period of 14 
months and the expiry date, by category shall be extended by a 
period of 14 months, or 

(c) 

beginning on 1 November 2020 and ending on 31 July 2021, the 
learner permit in respect of the category concerned shall be 
deemed to have been granted for an additional period of 10 
months and the expiry date, by category shall be extended by a 
period of 10 months.

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No.
heading: 5. The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 5)
text_raw:
5. The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 5) 

Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 235 of 2020) are revoked.

EAMON RYAN,

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations expand the extension of validity of learner permits previously 
granted in response to the Covid-19 pandemic. 

A learner permit that expired between 1 March 2020 and 30 June 2020 has now 
been extended for 18 months from the date of expiry specified on the permit. 

A learner permit that expired between 1 July 2020 and 31 October 2020 has now 
been extended for 14 months from the date of expiry specified on the permit. 

A learner permit that expired between 1 November 2020 and 31 July 2021 has 
now been extended for 10 months from the date of expiry specified on the permit. 

The above extensions apply to all the categories listed on the learner permit from 
the date of expiry for each category. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [303] 5
